src.router

Class Router

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.router.Router

  • public class Router
extends java.lang.Object
    The router class that actually does the work of router PDUs using the binary search trie and arp table.
    Author:
    silval

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Router(BinarySearchTrie routingTrie, ARPTable arpTable)
      Create a router with the given router binary search trie and the arpTable.
      Router(BinarySearchTrie routingTrie, ARPTable arpTable, NATTable natTable)
      Create a router with a natTable for part 2.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Route generateRoute(IPv4PDU pdu)
      Generate the route for a given pdu using the binary search trie and arp table.
